Title: Shubho Mahurat
Writer: Sudeshna Bandyopadhyay (english translations), Agatha Christie (story), Debabrata Dutta (screenplay), Rituparno Ghosh (screenplay)
Actors: Sharmila Tagore, Nandita Das, Kalyani Mandal, Moumita Gupta
Plot: An actress mysteriously dies after the "Shubho Mahurat," a celebration of the first shot of the film. A journalist and her perceptive aunt investigate.
